title: 220. “I Don't Know What You've Done With My Husband, But He's a Changed Man.”
description: From domestic abusers to former child soldiers, there is increasing evidence that behavioral therapy can turn them around.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
